Atlassian

Atlassian Product Manager Intern (Remote) 2026

Partner with design and engineering to shape Atlassian product experiences in a remote PM internship.

CompanyAtlassian
RoleProduct Manager Intern
LocationRemote
Duration12 weeks
StipendExpected/Indicative: USD 4k–6k/month
Work Hours40 hours/week
Employment TypeIntern
Experience0-2 years

Eligibility & Skills

  • Students/new grads with product sense and analytical ability
  • Education: B.S./M.S./MBA in relevant fields
  • Branches allowed: Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics, Business
  • Skills: Product discovery, Experimentation, Data analysis, Communication
  • Year of study: 2026/2027 grads
  • Age limit: Per company policy

What you will work on

  • Define problem statements and success metrics for key product areas.
  • Prioritize roadmap items and partner with design/engineering on delivery.
  • Review experiments and customer feedback to iterate quickly.

What makes you a fit

  1. Structured problem solving and clear writing.
  2. Comfort with SQL/analytics tools.
  3. Empathy for users and bias for evidence-backed decisions.

Interview stages

  • Recruiter screen.
  • Product sense case + analytics discussion.
  • Panel with PM/Design/Eng.
  • Offer with stipend and remote onboarding steps.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 12 March 2026.
